name: Petition for a new trial
text: [§124A-101]  Petition for a new trial.  At any time within two years after approval by the convening authority of a court-martial sentence which extends to dismissal, dishonorable or bad-conduct discharge, the accused may petition the governor for a new trial on ground of newly discovered evidence or fraud on the court-martial. [L 1982, c 171, pt of §2]
